page.title: 18Transport
page.content: Buses are the only public transport apart from taxis serving the area. Buses are run by the Maidstone & District Bus Company. Service 291 passes through the village from East Grinstead to Tunbridge Wells. There are eight buses a day weekdays and two on Sundays. The nearest train stations are at T.Wells,Edenbridge and East Grinstead. There is quite a good service to Victoria(LONDON). The Hartfield line was closed down in the 1960's. Gatwick Air Port is 17 miles away. The ferry port of Newhaven is 30 miles to the south. This service goes to Dieppe. Most families have their own cars Only 2 boys bring their bikes to school.
